[[Image:Tolkien Calendar 1997 (Polish).jpg|thumb]]

The '''Tolkien Calendar 1997''' was published by the [[Polish Tolkien Society]] and features pen and ink illustrations as well as dates by various reckonings.

* Dimensions: 11 3/4 x 16 1/2 inches
* Clear plastic sheet over half of cover
* White plastic comb bound
